scripts.deploy_dev: ssh -t -i _deploy/goingsunny.pem centos@52.221.229.162 'cd prod/gsun-datacenter && sudo git pull && pm2 startOrRestart pm2.json --env development'
scripts.deploy_dev_hard: ssh -t -i _deploy/goingsunny.pem centos@52.221.229.162 'cd prod/gsun-datacenter && sudo git pull && sudo npm install && pm2 startOrRestart pm2.json --env development'
scripts.deploy_prod: ssh -t -i _deploy/goingsunny.pem centos@52.221.229.162 'cd prod/gsun-datacenter && sudo git pull && sudo npm run build && pm2 startOrRestart pm2.json --env production'
